Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Relates to the closure of the Rikers Island correctional facility within 3 years
Summary: Requires the city of New York to close the Rikers Island correctional facility within 3 years.
ActClause: AN ACT authorizing the closure of the Rikers Island correctional facility; and providing for the repeal of such provision upon expiration thereof
